Today, the Causeway Coast is seeing poor conditions with 2 ft @10s WNW swell and fresh 19 mph S winds. Tomorrow, it drops to 1 ft @9s WNW, still blown out with 16 mph W winds. On the day after, conditions improve to 3 ft @12s WNW with lighter 11 mph SSE winds, making it a good day for spots like White Park Bay and Portballintrae. Best: day after.
